00116 EXTERNC int minet_init(minet_socket_types type) {
00117 
00118     if (type == MINET_KERNEL) {
00119         socket_type = KERNEL_SOCKS;
00120 
00121     } else if (type == MINET_USER) {
00122 
00123         socket_type = MINET_SOCKS;
00124         MinetInit(MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE);
00125 
00126         sock = MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) ? MinetConnect(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00127 
00128         if ( (sock == MINET_NOHANDLE) && 
00129              (MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE))) {
00130 
00131             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to sock_module"));
00132 
00133             DEBUGPRINTF(1, string("socklib in minet_init(): Can't connect to sock_module. Check that the sock_module loaded successfully.\n").c_str());
00134 
00135             socket_type = UNINIT_SOCKS;
00136 
00137             return socket_type;
00138         }
00139 
00140         MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("socklib up"));
00141 
00142     } else {
00143         DEBUGPRINTF(1, string("socklib in minet_init(): Invalid argument. Must be MINET_KERNEL or MINET_USER.\n").c_str());
00144         socket_type = UNINIT_SOCKS;
00145     }
00146 
00147     return (socket_type);
00148 }
00149 
00175 EXTERNC int minet_deinit() {
00176     if (socket_type == MINET_SOCKS) {
00177         MinetDeinit();
00178     }
00179 
00180     socket_type = UNINIT_SOCKS;
00181 
00182     return (socket_type);
00183 }

00267 EXTERNC int minet_error() {
00268     switch (socket_type) {
00269         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00270             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00271             return -1;
00272             break;
00273         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00274             return errno;
00275             break;
00276         case MINET_SOCKS:
00277             return minet_errno;
00278             break;
00279         default:
00280             minet_errno = ENODEV;
00281             return minet_errno;
00282     }
00283 }

00324 EXTERNC int minet_perror(const char * s) {
00325     switch (socket_type) {
00326         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00327             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00328             return (-1);
00329             break;
00330         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00331             perror(s);
00332             return (0);
00333             break;
00334         case MINET_SOCKS:
00335             cerr << s;
00336             switch (minet_errno) {
00337                 case EOK:
00338                     cerr << ": Ok" << endl;
00339                     break;
00340                 case ENOMATCH:
00341                     cerr << ": No match found" << endl;
00342                     break;
00343                 case EBUF_SPACE:
00344                     cerr << ": Buffer space error" << endl;
00345                     break;
00346                 case EUNKNOWN:
00347                     cerr << ": Unknown error" << endl;
00348                     break;
00349                 case ERESOURCE_UNAVAIL:
00350                     cerr << ": Resource unavailable" << endl;
00351                     break;
00352                 case EINVALID_OP:
00353                     cerr << ": Invalid operation" << endl;
00354                     break;
00355                 case ENOT_IMPLEMENTED:
00356                     cerr << ": Function not implemented" << endl;
00357                     break;
00358                 case ENOT_SUPPORTED:
00359                     cerr << ": Not supported" << endl;
00360                     break;
00361                 case EWOULD_BLOCK:
00362                     cerr << ": Would block" << endl;
00363                     break;
00364                 case ECONN_FAILED:
00365                     cerr << ": Connection failed" << endl;
00366                     break;
00367                 default:
00368                     cerr << ": Unknown error" << endl;
00369             }
00370             return (0);
00371             break;
00372         default:
00373             cerr << s << ": UNKNOWN SOCKET TYPE" << endl;
00374             minet_errno = ENODEV;
00375             break;
00376     }
00377 
00378     return -1;
00379 }
00380 
00447 EXTERNC int minet_socket(int type) {
00448     switch (socket_type) {
00449         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00450             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00451             return (-1);
00452             break;
00453         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00454             if ((type == SOCK_STREAM) || (type == SOCK_DGRAM)) {
00455                 return (socket (AF_INET, type, 0));
00456             }
00457             break;
00458         case MINET_SOCKS: {
00459             SockLibRequestResponse slrr;
00460             switch (type) {
00461                 case SOCK_STREAM:
00462                     slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mSOCKET,
00463                                                   Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00464                                                              IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00465                                                              TCP_PORT_NONE,
00466                                                              TCP_PORT_NONE,
00467                                                              IP_PROTO_TCP),
00468                                                   UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
00469                                                   Buffer(),
00470                                                   0, 0);
00471                     break;
00472                 case SOCK_DGRAM:
00473                     slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mSOCKET,
00474                                                   Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00475                                                              IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00476                                                              UDP_PORT_NONE,
00477                                                              UDP_PORT_NONE,
00478                                                              IP_PROTO_UDP),
00479                                                   UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
00480                                                   Buffer(),
00481                                                   0, 0);
00482                     break;
00483             }
00484 
00485             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
00486             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
00487             minet_errno = slrr.error;
00488 
00489             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
00490                 return (-1);
00491             }
00492 
00493             return (slrr.sockfd);
00494             break;
00495         }
00496         default:
00497             minet_errno = ENODEV;
00498             break;
00499     }
00500 
00501     return -1;
00502 }

00582 EXTERNC int minet_bind(int sockfd, struct sockaddr_in * myaddr) {
00583     switch (socket_type) {
00584         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00585             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00586             return (-1);
00587             break;
00588         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00589             return bind(sockfd, (sockaddr *)myaddr, sizeof(*myaddr));
00590             break;
00591         case MINET_SOCKS: {
00592             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mBIND,
00593                                         Connection(IPAddress(ntohl((unsigned)myaddr->sin_addr.s_addr)),
00594                                                    IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00595                                                    (unsigned short)ntohs(myaddr->sin_port),
00596                                                    PORT_NONE,
00597                                                    0),
00598                                         sockfd,
00599                                         Buffer(),
00600                                         0, 0);
00601             //    cerr << slrr << endl;
00602             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
00603             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
00604             minet_errno = slrr.error;
00605 
00606             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
00607                 return -1;
00608             }
00609 
00610             return 0;
00611             break;
00612         }
00613         default:
00614             minet_errno = ENODEV;
00615             break;
00616     }
00617 
00618     return -1;
00619 }

00662 EXTERNC int minet_listen(int sockfd, int backlog) {
00663     switch (socket_type) {
00664         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00665             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00666             return (-1);
00667             break;
00668         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00669             return listen(sockfd, backlog);
00670             break;
00671         case MINET_SOCKS: {
00672             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mLISTEN, Connection(), sockfd, 
00673                                         Buffer(), 0, 0);
00674             
00675             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
00676             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
00677             minet_errno = slrr.error;
00678             
00679             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
00680                 return -1;
00681             }
00682             
00683             return 0;
00684             break;
00685         }
00686         default:
00687             minet_errno = ENODEV;
00688             break;
00689     }
00690 
00691     return -1;
00692 }

00789 EXTERNC int minet_accept(int sockfd, struct sockaddr_in * addr) {
00790     socklen_t length = sizeof(*addr);
00791 
00792     switch (socket_type) {
00793         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00794             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00795             return -1;
00796             break;
00797         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00798             return accept(sockfd, (sockaddr *)addr, &length);
00799             break;
00800         case MINET_SOCKS: {
00801             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mACCEPT,
00802                                         Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00803                                                    IPAddress((unsigned)addr->sin_addr.s_addr),
00804                                                    TCP_PORT_NONE,
00805                                                    (unsigned short)addr->sin_port,
00806                                                    0),
00807                                         sockfd,
00808                                         Buffer(),
00809                                         0, 0);
00810             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
00811             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
00812             minet_errno = slrr.error;
00813             
00814             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
00815                 return -1;
00816             }
00817             
00818             return (slrr.sockfd);
00819             break;
00820         }
00821         default:
00822             minet_errno = ENODEV;
00823             break;
00824     }
00825 
00826     return -1;
00827 }

00943 EXTERNC int minet_connect(int sockfd, struct sockaddr_in * addr) {
00944     switch (socket_type) {
00945         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
00946             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
00947             return (-1);
00948             break;
00949         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
00950             return (connect (sockfd, (sockaddr *) addr, sizeof(*addr)));
00951             break;
00952         case MINET_SOCKS: {
00953             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mCONNECT,
00954                                         Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
00955                                                    IPAddress(ntohl((unsigned)addr->sin_addr.s_addr)),
00956                                                    TCP_PORT_NONE,
00957                                                    ntohs((unsigned short)addr->sin_port),
00958                                                    0),
00959                                         sockfd,
00960                                         Buffer(),
00961                                         0, 0);
00962             
00963             debug(3) << "socklib: Connecting to: " << slrr.connection.dest << std::endl;
00964             
00965             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
00966             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
00967             minet_errno = slrr.error;
00968 
00969             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
00970                 debug(1) << "socklib: minet_connect() failed." << std::endl;
00971                 return -1;
00972             }
00973 
00974             return 0;
00975             break;
00976         }
00977         default:
00978             minet_errno = ENODEV;
00979             break;
00980     }
00981 
00982     return -1;
00983 }

01061 EXTERNC int minet_read(int fd, char * buf, int len) {
01062     switch (socket_type) {
01063         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01064             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01065             return -1;
01066             break;
01067         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01068             return read(fd, buf, len);
01069             break;
01070         case MINET_SOCKS: {
01071             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mREAD, Connection(), fd,
01072                                         Buffer(buf, len), 0, 0);
01073             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01074             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01075             minet_errno = slrr.error;
01076 
01077             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
01078                 return -1;
01079             }
01080 
01081             Buffer b;
01082             b = slrr.data;
01083             b.GetData(buf, b.GetSize(), 0);
01084 
01085             return (b.GetSize());
01086 
01087             break;
01088         }
01089         default:
01090             minet_errno = ENODEV;
01091             break;
01092     }
01093 
01094     return -1;
01095 }

01170 EXTERNC int minet_write(int fd, char * buf, int len)
01171 {
01172     switch (socket_type) {
01173         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01174             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01175             return (-1);
01176             break;
01177         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01178             return write(fd, buf, len);
01179             break;
01180         case MINET_SOCKS: {
01181             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mWRITE, Connection(), fd,
01182                                         Buffer(buf, len), 0, 0);
01183             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01184             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01185             minet_errno = slrr.error;
01186             
01187             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
01188                 return (-1);
01189             }
01190             
01191             return (slrr.bytes);
01192             break;
01193         }
01194         default:
01195             minet_errno = ENODEV;
01196             break;
01197     }
01198 
01199     return -1;
01200 }

01317 EXTERNC int minet_recvfrom (int fd, char * buf, int len,
01318                             struct sockaddr_in * from) {
01319 
01320     socklen_t length = sizeof(*from);
01321 
01322     switch (socket_type) {
01323         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01324             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01325             return -1;
01326             break;
01327         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01328             return recvfrom(fd, buf, len, 0, (sockaddr *)from, &length);
01329             break;
01330         case MINET_SOCKS: {
01331             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mRECVFROM,
01332                                         Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
01333                                                    IPAddress((unsigned)from->sin_addr.s_addr),
01334                                                    UDP_PORT_NONE,
01335                                                    (unsigned short)from->sin_port,
01336                                                    0),
01337                                         fd,
01338                                         Buffer(buf, len),
01339                                         0, 0);
01340             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01341             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01342             minet_errno = slrr.error;
01343 
01344             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
01345                 return -1;
01346             }
01347 
01348             return 0;
01349             break;
01350         }
01351         default:
01352             minet_errno = ENODEV;
01353             break;
01354     }
01355 
01356     return -1;
01357 }

01368 EXTERNC int minet_sendto(int fd, char * buf, int len,
01369                           struct sockaddr_in * to) {
01370     switch (socket_type) {
01371         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01372             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01373             return (-1);
01374             break;
01375         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01376             return sendto(fd, buf, len, 0, (sockaddr *)to, sizeof(*to));
01377             break;
01378         case MINET_SOCKS: {
01379             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mSENDTO,
01380                                         Connection(IP_ADDRESS_ANY,
01381                                                    IPAddress(ntohl((unsigned)to->sin_addr.s_addr)),
01382                                                    UDP_PORT_NONE,
01383                                                    ntohs((unsigned short)to->sin_port),
01384                                                    0),
01385                                         fd,
01386                                         Buffer(buf, len),
01387                                         0, 0);
01388             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01389             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01390             minet_errno = slrr.error;
01391 
01392             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
01393                 return -1;
01394             }
01395             
01396             return 0;
01397             break;
01398         }
01399         default:
01400             minet_errno=ENODEV;
01401             break;
01402     }

01404     return -1;

01408 EXTERNC int minet_close(int sockfd) {
01409     switch (socket_type) {
01410         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01411             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01412             return -1;
01413             break;
01414         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01415             return close(sockfd);
01416             break;
01417         case MINET_SOCKS: {
01418             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mCLOSE, Connection(), sockfd,
01419                                         Buffer(), 0, 0);
01420             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01421             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01422             minet_errno = slrr.error;
01423 
01424             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
01425                 return -1;
01426             }
01427 
01428             return 0;
01429             break;
01430         }
01431         default:
01432             minet_errno = ENODEV;
01433             break;
01434     }
01435 
01436     return -1;
01437 }

01445 EXTERNC int minet_select (int minet_maxfd,
01446                           fd_set * minet_read_fds,
01447                           fd_set * minet_write_fds,
01448                           fd_set * minet_except_fds,
01449                           struct timeval * timeout) {
01450     switch (socket_type) {
01451         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01452             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01453             return (-1);
01454             break;
01455         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01456             return (select (minet_maxfd, minet_read_fds, minet_write_fds,
01457                             minet_except_fds, timeout));
01458             break;
01459         case MINET_SOCKS:
01460 #if SELECTPOLL_BROKEN
01461             return ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
01462 #else
01463             fd_set minet_read_fifos, minet_write_fifos, minet_except_fifos;
01464 
01465             FD_ZERO(&minet_read_fifos);
01466             FD_ZERO(&minet_write_fifos);
01467             FD_ZERO(&minet_except_fifos);
01468 
01469             for (int fd = 0; fd < (minet_maxfd + 1); fd++) {
01470 #if 0
01471                 if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_read_fds)) {
01472                     fd = open(sock2app_fifo_name, O_RDONLY);
01473                     FD_SET(fd, &minet_read_fifos);
01474                 } else if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_write_fds)) {
01475                     fd = open(app2sock_fifo_name, O_WRONLY);
01476                     FD_SET(fd, &minet_write_fifos);
01477                 } else if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_except_fds)) {
01478                     fd = open(app2sock_fifo_name, O_WRONLY);
01479                     FD_SET(fd, &minet_except_fifos);
01480                 }
01481 #else
01482                 if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_read_fds)) {
01483                     FD_SET(fd, &minet_read_fifos);
01484                 } else if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_write_fds)) {
01485                     FD_SET(fd, &minet_write_fifos);
01486                 } else if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_except_fds)) {
01487                     FD_SET(fd, &minet_except_fifos);
01488                 }
01489 #endif
01490             }
01491             
01492         // eh? - PAD
01493         //int numfds = select(minet_maxfd, &minet_read_fifos, &minet_write_fifos,
01494         //&minet_except_fifos, timeout);
01495 
01496         SockLibRequestResponse slrr;
01497 
01498         if (numfds) {
01499             slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mSELECT,
01500                                           Connection(),
01501                                           UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
01502                                           Buffer(),
01503                                           0,
01504                                           ESET_SELECT,
01505                                           minet_read_fifos,
01506                                           minet_write_fifos,
01507                                           minet_except_fifos);
01508             
01509             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01510             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01511         } else {
01512             slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mSELECT,
01513                                           Connection(),
01514                                           UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
01515                                           Buffer(),
01516                                           0,
01517                                           ECLEAR_SELECT,
01518                                           minet_read_fifos,
01519                                           minet_write_fifos,
01520                                           minet_except_fifos);
01521             
01522             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01523             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01524         }
01525 
01526 
01527         int ctr = 0;
01528 
01529         for (int j = 0; j < (minet_maxfd + 1); j++) {
01530             if (FD_ISSET(j, &minet_read_fifos) ||
01531                 FD_ISSET(j, &minet_write_fifos) ||
01532                 FD_ISSET(j, &minet_except_fifos)) {
01533                 ctr++;
01534             }
01535         }
01536 
01537         return (ctr);
01538 #endif
01539         break;
01540     default:
01541         minet_errno = ENODEV;
01542         break;
01543     }
01544 
01545     return -1;
01546 }

01549 EXTERNC int minet_select_ex (int minet_maxfd,

01571                            unix_except_fds, timeout));
01572 #endif

01575 #if SELECTPOLL_BROKEN
01576             return ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
01577 #else
01578             fd_set minet_read_fifos, minet_write_fifos, minet_except_fifos;

01597                 if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_read_fds)) {
01598                     FD_SET(fd, &minet_read_fifos);
01599                 } else if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_write_fds)) {
01600                     FD_SET(fd, &minet_write_fifos);
01601                 } else if (FD_ISSET(fd, minet_except_fds)) {
01602                     FD_SET(fd, &minet_except_fifos);
01603                 };
01604 #endif
01605             }
01606 
01607             //int numfds = select(minet_maxfd, &minet_read_fifos, &minet_write_fifos,
01608             //&minet_except_fifos, timeout);
01609             SockLibRequestResponse slrr;
01610             if (numfds) { 
01611                 slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mSELECT,
01612                                               Connection(),
01613                                               UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
01614                                               Buffer(),
01615                                               0,
01616                                               ESET_SELECT,
01617                                               minet_read_fifos,
01618                                               minet_write_fifos,
01619                                               minet_except_fifos);
01620                 
01621                 MinetSend(sock,slrr);
01622                 MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
01623             } else {
01624                 slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mSELECT,
01625                                               Connection(),
01626                                               UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
01627                                               Buffer(),
01628                                               0,
01629                                               ECLEAR_SELECT,
01630                                               minet_read_fifos,
01631                                               minet_write_fifos,
01632                                               minet_except_fifos);
01633                 
01634                 MinetSend(sock,slrr);
01635                 MinetReceive(sock,slrr);
01636             }
01637             
01638             int ctr = 0;
01639             
01640             for (int j = 0; j < (minet_maxfd + 1); j++) {
01641                 if (FD_ISSET(j, &minet_read_fifos) ||
01642                     FD_ISSET(j, &minet_write_fifos) ||
01643                     FD_ISSET(j, &minet_except_fifos)) {
01644                     ctr++;
01645                 }
01646             }
01647             return ctr;
01648             
01649             // NO NO NO NO
01650             //    return (ctr ||
01651             //    select(unix_maxfd, unix_read_fds, unix_write_fds,
01652             //     unix_except_fds, timeout));
01653 #endif
01654             break;
01655         default:
01656             minet_errno = ENODEV;
01657             break;
01658     }
01659 
01660     return -1;
01661 }
01662 
01663 
01664 EXTERNC int minet_poll(struct pollfd * minet_fds,
01665                        int num_minet_fds,
01666                        int timeout) {
01667     switch (socket_type) {
01668         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01669             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01670             return -1;
01671             break;
01672         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01673             return poll(minet_fds, num_minet_fds, timeout);
01674             break;
01675         case MINET_SOCKS:
01676 #if SELECTPOLL_BROKEN
01677             return ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
01678 #else
01679             struct pollfd * minet_fifos = (struct pollfd*)malloc(num_minet_fds * sizeof(struct pollfd));
01680 
01681             for (int i = 0; i < num_minet_fds; i++) {
01682                 minet_fifos[i].fd = open(sock2app_fifo_name, O_RDWR);
01683                 minet_fifos[i].events = minet_fds[i].events;
01684                 minet_fifos[i].revents = minet_fds[i].revents;
01685             }
01686 
01687             int revnts = poll(minet_fifos, num_minet_fds, timeout);
01688 
01689             if (revnts) {
01690                 SockLibRequestResponse slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mPOLL, Connection(), UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
01691                                                                      Buffer(), 0, 0,
01692                                                                      num_minet_fds, *minet_fifos);
01693                 slrr.Serialize(tosock);
01694                 slrr.Unserialize(fromsock);
01695             } else {
01696                 int ctr = 0;
01697 
01698                 for (int j = 0; j < num_minet_fds; j++) {       
01699                     if (minet_fds[j].revents) {
01700                         ctr++;
01701                     }
01702                 }
01703 
01704                 return (ctr);
01705             }
01706 
01707             return revnts;
01708 #endif
01709             break;
01710         default:
01711             minet_errno = ENODEV;
01712             break;
01713     }
01714 
01715     return -1;
01716 }
01717 
01718 
01719 EXTERNC int minet_poll_ex(struct pollfd * minet_fds,
01720                           int num_minet_fds,
01721                           struct pollfd * unix_fds,
01722                           int num_unix_fds,
01723                           int timeout) {
01724     switch (socket_type) {
01725         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01726             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01727             return -1;
01728             break;
01729         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01730             return poll(minet_fds, num_minet_fds, timeout);
01731             break;
01732         case MINET_SOCKS:
01733 #if SELECTPOLL_BROKEN
01734             return ENOT_IMPLEMENTED;
01735 #else
01736 
01737             struct pollfd * minet_fifos = (struct pollfd *)malloc(num_minet_fds * sizeof(struct pollfd));
01738 
01739             for (int i = 0; i < num_minet_fds; i++) {
01740                 minet_fifos[i].fd = open(sock2app_fifo_name, O_RDWR);
01741                 minet_fifos[i].events = minet_fds[i].events;
01742                 minet_fifos[i].revents = minet_fds[i].revents;
01743             }
01744 
01745             int revnts = poll(minet_fifos, num_minet_fds, timeout);
01746 
01747             if (revnts) {
01748                 SockLibRequestResponse slrr = SockLibRequestResponse(mPOLL, Connection(), UNSPECIFIED_SOCK,
01749                                                                      Buffer(), 0, 0,
01750                                                                      num_minet_fds, *minet_fifos);
01751                 slrr.Serialize(tosock);
01752                 slrr.Unserialize(fromsock);
01753             } else {
01754                 int ctr = 0;
01755 
01756                 for (int j = 0; j < num_minet_fds; j++) {
01757                     if (minet_fds[j].revents) {
01758                         ctr++;
01759                     }
01760                 }
01761 
01762                 return (ctr || poll(unix_fds, num_unix_fds, timeout));
01763             }
01764 
01765             return (revnts || poll(unix_fds, num_unix_fds, timeout));
01766 #endif
01767             break;
01768         default:
01769             minet_errno = ENODEV;
01770             break;
01771     }
01772 
01773     return -1;
01774 }
01775 
01784 EXTERNC int minet_set_nonblocking(int sockfd) {
01785     switch (socket_type) {
01786     case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01787         errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01788         return -1;
01789         break;
01790     case KERNEL_SOCKS: {
01791         int val = 1;
01792         int x = ioctl(sockfd, FIONBIO, &val);
01793 
01794         if (x) {
01795             return -1;
01796         }
01797 
01798         return 0;
01799         break;
01800     }
01801     case MINET_SOCKS: {
01802         SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mSET_NONBLOCKING, Connection(), sockfd,
01803                                     Buffer(), 0, 0);
01804 
01805         MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01806         MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01807         minet_errno = slrr.error;
01808 
01809         if (minet_errno != EOK) {
01810             return -1;
01811         }
01812 
01813         return 0;
01814         break;
01815     }
01816     default:
01817         minet_errno = ENODEV;
01818         break;
01819     }
01820 
01821     return -1;
01822 }
01823 
01824 
01825 EXTERNC int minet_set_blocking(int sockfd) {
01826     switch (socket_type) {
01827         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01828             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01829             return (-1);
01830             break;
01831 
01832         case KERNEL_SOCKS: {
01833             int val = 0;
01834             int x = ioctl(sockfd, FIONBIO, &val);
01835 
01836             if (x) {
01837                 return (-1);
01838             }
01839 
01840             return 0;
01841             break;
01842         }
01843         case MINET_SOCKS: {
01844             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mSET_BLOCKING, Connection(), sockfd,
01845                                         Buffer(), 0, 0);
01846             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01847             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01848             minet_errno = slrr.error;
01849 
01850             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
01851                 return -1;
01852             }
01853 
01854             return 0;
01855             break;
01856         }
01857         default:
01858             minet_errno = ENODEV;
01859             break;
01860     }
01861 
01862     return -1;
01863 }

01866 EXTERNC int minet_can_write_now(int sockfd) {
01867     switch (socket_type) {
01868 
01869         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01870             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01871             return -1;
01872             break;
01873 
01874         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01875             fd_set write_fds;
01876             FD_ZERO(&write_fds);
01877             FD_SET(sockfd, &write_fds);
01878             return select(sockfd+1, NULL, &write_fds, NULL, 0);
01879             break;
01880 
01881         case MINET_SOCKS: {
01882             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mCAN_WRITE_NOW, Connection(), sockfd,
01883                                         Buffer(), 0, 0);
01884             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01885             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01886             minet_errno = slrr.error;
01887 
01888             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
01889                 return -1;
01890             }
01891 
01892             return 0;
01893             break;
01894         }
01895         default:
01896             minet_errno = ENODEV;
01897             break;
01898     }
01899 
01900     return -1;
01901 }
01902 
01903 
01904 EXTERNC int minet_can_read_now(int sockfd) {
01905     switch (socket_type) {
01906         case UNINIT_SOCKS:
01907             errno = ENODEV;            // "No such device" error
01908             return -1;
01909             break;
01910 
01911         case KERNEL_SOCKS:
01912             fd_set read_fds;
01913             FD_ZERO(&read_fds);
01914             FD_SET(sockfd, &read_fds);
01915             return select(sockfd + 1, &read_fds, NULL, NULL, 0);
01916             break;
01917 
01918         case MINET_SOCKS: {
01919             SockLibRequestResponse slrr(mCAN_READ_NOW, Connection(), sockfd,
01920                                         Buffer(), 0, 0);
01921 
01922             MinetSend(sock, slrr);
01923             MinetReceive(sock, slrr);
01924             minet_errno = slrr.error;
01925 
01926             if (minet_errno != EOK) {
01927                 return -1;
01928             }
01929 
01930             return 0;
01931             break;
01932 
01933         }
01934         default:
01935             minet_errno = ENODEV;
01936             break;
01937     }
01938 
01939     return -1;
01940 }
